member.name: T:RuntimeUnityEditor.Bepin5.LogViewer.LogViewerWindow
member.summary: A way to display and filter BepInEx log messages.

member.name: P:RuntimeUnityEditor.Bepin5.LogViewer.LogViewerWindow.SearchString
member.summary: Filter log messages by this string

member.name: T:RuntimeUnityEditor.Bepin5.RuntimeUnityEditor5
member.summary: This is a loader plugin for BepInEx5. When referencing RuntimeUnityEditor from other code it's recommended to not reference this assembly and instead reference RuntimeUnityEditorCore directly. If you need your code to run after RUE is initialized, add a [BepInDependency(RuntimeUnityEditorCore.GUID)] attribute to your plugin. You can see if RuntimeUnityEditor has finished loading with RuntimeUnityEditorCore.IsInitialized().
